about_the_game:
Who will you be when they arrive? Forgather is a 2D Pixel Art Action/Adventure episodic tale that takes place in the capital, Onstaan. You play as the Main Protagonist, Maeyriss as she wakes up into a Lucin ridden city.

Throughout your exploration in this 2D/pixel art world you may come across refugees that need help, new items or abilities, and even lore to help you figure out how the capital became a wasteland.

If you need to take a step away from the combat, you can always go visit the hub to stock up on any equipment or mysterious events from certain characters that may occur.

As you wander through the ruins of the capitol, you will meet characters that will assist you on your journey. Call in support during battle from your allies for "Aggression Spikes." These points take you beyond your limit to devastate your opposition with flashy solo abilities or group attacks.

Forgather is the first game of an "All-encompassing" story line under the Title "Project Worth" that will be episodic . This 2D Pixel Art action game takes place in the far future where life outside of the human race has already been discovered, Technology has already advanced beyond what we thought was possible, and the vast universe has become more dangerous due to what new knowledge of what lies past our solar system.

short_description: Who will you be when they arrive? Forgather is a 2D Pixel Art Action/Adventure episodic tale that takes place in the capital, Onstaan. Traverse this Lucin plagued city as you battle your way through the STAR's forces until you find out what it means to be Worthy.
